title: Instant 14 days ban after 1 game behaivor? Is it normal?
body:
So, today i received a 14day ban from riot. which i found it weird because it was a game that happened 3 days ago. and in my entire league life i've NEVER received a warning or a chat restrict. 

this is what i said
Game 1
Payamsko: therewe go
Payamsko: rats are always greedy
Payamsko: lul
Payamsko: kog
Payamsko: ur trolling
Payamsko: why the fuck
Payamsko: u recall
Payamsko: cuz you recalled
Payamsko: boiii
Payamsko: ?
Payamsko: taric ult op
Payamsko: shield kog
Payamsko: get it
Payamsko: aa
Payamsko: holyshit
Payamsko: u suck
Payamsko: or click
Payamsko: right click
Payamsko: plat players lol
Payamsko: are u serious
Payamsko: i rather have diana all the kills
Payamsko: now they have baron
Payamsko: what did i do wrong this game
Payamsko: thats not karma
Payamsko: its called retard
Payamsko: ok
Payamsko: let me not talk about ur bot lane
Payamsko: pls
Payamsko: man our bot lane
Payamsko: isucks
Payamsko: sucks
Payamsko: better bot wins
Payamsko: HAHAHA
Payamsko: THIS KOG

yeah, i was a bit hotheaded but it was 1 game out of 400 were i actually talked. Never been chat restricted or a warning whatsoever.
ofcourse its not good what ive done, but yeah giving me a instant 14 days ban is no mercy

replies.body: You were given the wrong chat logs, which is why it seemed strange the game was from 3 days ago. You can write in to player support for the correct logs, or I can post them for you if you'd like.
wrong chat logs? well post it

can u remove that
so annoying lol
nice
cuz you cant play yas
no shit
can we ff
pls
boring af
take my entire camp, im on my phone anyways
what mongol votes no
pls kys
yes
fucking tards
pls kys
tahm and jayce
[All] take it
I see now, yeah trolls wins easy, btw normally u get chat restrict which i never had or a warning but ok.  trolls wins

Bro, #1 rule of the internet, don't feed the trolls. You should know better than that. They _want_ you to flame them.

Also, the reason it instantly escalated to a 14 day ban is because KYS is zero tolerance.
oh yeah right, well next time i wont say a word and you will hear a few months that im banned for not communicating

> [{quoted}](name=Payamsko,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bzh0V6rO,comment-id=000100010000000200010000,timestamp=2017-10-12T20:41:17.408+0000)
>
> oh yeah right, well next time i wont say a word and you will hear a few months that im banned for not communicating

You cannot be banned for not communicating. That is a myth. You are under no obligation to ping, chat, or communicate in any way.
"mongol" and "tards" could get you there too.
Telling someone to kill themselves is considered *extreme* toxicity and will result in an instant 14 day "last warning" ban.

saying kys is an automatic 14 day ban........
seeing these chat logs i wonder why you were not perm banned
ugh sweet summer child he had 4 lines of toxic text all probably written withing 2 seconds

> [{quoted}](name=Payamsko,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bzh0V6rO,comment-id=0001000100000002,timestamp=2017-10-12T20:31:56.311+0000)
>
> I see now, yeah trolls wins easy, btw normally u get chat restrict which i never had or a warning but ok.  trolls wins

Telling other players to kill themselves is considered extreme toxicity, and escalates your ban.
No. If you use hate speech or recial slur then you skip the 10 games chat restriction and 25 games chat restriction.

Normally you would just get chat restricted.

Except that you told someone to kill themselves. Which Riot punishes equally severely as hate speech.

You don't get any chat restriction warnings for saying that sort of thing, they just put you immediately on 14-day ban and after that you're on probation. Any further slip ups and you will be permabanned.

Working as intended.

Oh he said kys better nuke his account

Its just a generic insult nowdays


Saying someone to kys / you are a moron/imbecil/retarded has the same flame value 


why wasnt he chat restricted?
Because "kys" isn't on the same level as the others. It's not a generic insult, it's a good deal beyond that.

if it gets overused like it did few months it becomes generic insult


Get ebola was insane insult at the start
Same as get cancer  but their values got loverd


Wishing someone to get cancer is even worse then wishing someone death imo


wishing someone to suffer is worse then death to

Notice the categories of your insults. There's the "You are a ______" insults, then there are the "Go get/do ________" insults. Notice that the less severe ones (you're a moron, you imbecile) fall into the first category, while all the ones we agree are severe (get cancer, get ebola, go kill yourself) fall into the second category.

I still maintain that telling someone to kill themselves isn't a joking matter. I vividly remember staying up with someone to prevent them from committing suicide, and while there are many factors that go into situations like that one of the tipping points for them was someone saying "kys" in League.

I can't sit by and let people think that saying "kys" to strangers is OK. It's not, it's very much worthy of the 14 day ban it gets.

I can write 15 times more toxic insult which goes around a system


Thats the problem with it


   **System is flawed in my eyes on 4 points**
a) Creative flame goes around it without direction words)
b) Multiple reports are valued as 1 XD great.  
  If 1 report has value of 1 why does 9 reports have value of 1? I am not saying 9 reports should have value of 9. And of course if this were changed premade reports would be reduced (altough how often do you report a player when your premade tells you ... yeah almost never , and extremly rarely someone listens to me..)

c)  There is no such thing as a report spammer? ?????????? There are people who spam reports way to much. Their value should get reduced as fk

d)  Out of context Stuff (Chat logs are out of context to)


Tribunal used to give us full chat. I used to vote in a tribunal. We could see a context. It was better):




But hey atleast we autoban people for saying Kys which is extremly popular insult

Survey says...

_Drumroll_

Ban deserved.
wow......... yea.... thats a doosy
Thanks for giving it!

"you were given the wrong chat logs"

Yes sure no he wasnt. He was reported for no reason in 1 game and that game was the last one with multiple reports so it got shown to him


So you started digging and found some recent toxicity and linked him that 




Rich company makes a budget ban system YAY

Actually, zero tolerance games should always give the 'trigger game' as the chat log. There is a known bug where the trigger game is sometimes not given for zero tolerance penalties (and only zero tolerance penalies). Something I've been meaning to go back and fix for awhile now.
Why was I banned?

For real tho, I didnt get a message or anything on why I was permabanned. Someone said to submit a ticket, and then they asked like 15 questions. Questions that nobody would know lol.

When did you make this account
What was the first thing you bought on it
What was the first 3 6300 ip champs you bought
etc.

Who in the world keeps track of that? But yeah I still dont know why im banned

As Djinn said, your account was not necessarily banned but *locked* or *suspended* - Riot saw signs your account was being hacked, compromised, or shared between individuals and wanted to ensure that only the original owner of the account had access to it.

> [{quoted}](name=Trash Jayce Main,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bzh0V6rO,comment-id=000100060000,timestamp=2017-10-12T20:38:56.297+0000)
>
> For real tho, I didnt get a message or anything on why I was permabanned. Someone said to submit a ticket, and then they asked like 15 questions. Questions that nobody would know lol.
> 
> When did you make this account
> What was the first thing you bought on it
> What was the first 3 6300 ip champs you bought
> etc.
> 
> Who in the world keeps track of that? But yeah I still dont know why im banned

If this is what is being asked, your account may have been banned for account compromise, since those are the questions you get asked for account recovery. Not 100% sure though.
So i basically lost my account forever because Riot thinks someone is in my account. Fun stuff, theres no way im gonna be able to answer all the questions.

You don't have to answer all of them - and in fact getting some of them close but wrong can actually help your case. Example: If they ask what the first three 6300 IP champs you bought were, and you give them the first one you remember and then another 2 of the top 5, or if they're out of order, etc. then it still shows you know information about the account.

Do your best to answer their questions and they'll make the determination as to if you have proven yourself the original owner or not. The system is designed that the original owner should get back their account - so if you are the original owner you shouldn't have any problem with it.
I could answer all of those questions about my account. I doubt you need 100% accuracy.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bzh0V6rO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-12T20:23:16.280+0000)
>
> ...or I can post them for you if you'd like.

_Heavy breathing_
Why was I banned?
Shit man, too many accounts. I think you have a problem xD.
Why did I get banned?
Go ahead and create your own thread with your chat logs if you would like to know.
Why was I banned?
Why was I banned?
Why was I banned?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

This is definitely pretty negative and worth punishment.

*But*, I *think* the only times I've seen escalation to 14 day before are hate-speech or slurs being used. Are you sure this is everything from the log?
Solved by Tantram, these were the wrong logs. The user was not given the correct logs in their reform card.
it could be because of the R word and the constant berating of his bot lane
yes this is everything

'rats are always greedy' 

its a racial slur towards jewish people and at times asians

~~I'm not 100% sure, but I believe the system is cracking down harder on the word "retard" lately. It's possible that the community reporting frequency for it has gone up enough that the system is prioritizing it more.~~

Solved by Tantram. Thanks!

this system is broken anyways, dont even deny me. i had in my adventure ppl saying kys had reported them yet they can still play XD 
laughable
